website_summaries.verdict: In spite of some known concerns, these electric socks have the most to offer in their class, including comfort, battery life, quality material, and remote.
pros: In addition to 3 heat settings and up to 11 hours of battery life per charge, these unisex socks top the pack in features that include moisture wicking material and remote control that allows wireless setting adjustments
cons: They tend to run long in the foot on some wearers
Some owners gripe about heating and battery issues – failure to get very warm

customer_reviews.title: Heating Doesn't Last After Initial Wash
customer_reviews.text: This product was very nice when I initially got it. I thought that it was just what I had been wanting to keep my feet warm when working outside in the winter with horses and loved the remote control. Basically, after the first time of washing the socks, they barely heated up any longer. The instructions state that it is okay to put the socks in the washer, but not the dryer. However, I wonder if I had hand-washed the socks if it would have made a difference. For the price, this was an extremely disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money. Wish I’d bought these long ago!
customer_reviews.text: These are extraordinary. My wife (from Rio) got frostbite in her small toe & suffered several years every Boston winter. I really researched many different types & price points. These are so worth the price!!! She’s so happy & totally comfortabe. They are pkenty warm, even the coldest days, & she does a lot of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby T

customer_reviews.title: that they are completely useless. After putting them on and not noticing any ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awful! They barely get Luke warm. I just received mine and tried them indoors. They really generate no heat to speak of. I work outside and was really looking forward to these socks. I can tell you, without even going outside, that they are completely useless. After putting them on and not noticing any heat on my feet I decided to try something. I put one bare foot in my boot, and the other with this sock on. They're was no difference that I could tell. The heat output is so little you can't even feel the difference between this sock and a bare foot. Don't waste your money on this product. I am returning mine
customer_reviews.author: jim f

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for those with cold toes!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are a life saver for a family member that has health problems dealing with the cold weather. They do a great job keeping the entire front of your foot warm. Many other models just warm the bottom of your foot, but this actually has heating elements around the toes. We use these when skiing and anytime we are outside. I noticed some complaints about the socks being very tight, but just order a little larger than you need and they will be perfect. The power charger takes a few hours but they last a long time even in the high heating mode.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Grekko

customer_reviews.title: Batteries do not last as long as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Warm when they work, but the remote does not always function properly. Also, according to the Mobile Warming website, they should work for 11+ hours on low. Both of mine lasted only 5 hours on low. The socks are also very tight around calves. I will be returning these because they do not function as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seem well-made
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 5-6 and these go up to 11. I have a hard time pulling on and find very snug (I’m 119 pounds). I wear on highest setting and don’t find them that warm. On lowest setting, I don’t feel any warmth at all. I should have sent back. What you don’t see on the pictures is how far the batteries stick out on the sides of the socks.
customer_reviews.author: Muffin

customer_reviews.title: Cold toes
customer_reviews.text: I have an issue with trying to keep my feet warm in the cold so I thought I would try these socks. They keep my calf and heel warm but no heat to the toes, where I really have an issue..
customer_reviews.author: Antonio DiFruscia

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent! Super comfy socks
customer_reviews.text: Most excellent ! Super comfy socks, with and without the heat on ! I love them. 😊They are now my favorite socks. Will order a second pair for horse activities. 🐎 Not too bulky, fit nicely in my shoes, and riding boots. Very best feature is the low setting. My foot warmer pads are quite warm, with no way to turn them down. LOVE the remote!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Trader

customer_reviews.title: I had high expecations
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife for christmas and had high expectations. She said that they work but the battery pack sticks out and she can't get her jeans over them. They are probably still a great product and I see her using them sometimes but not as often as I had hopped
customer_reviews.author: Austin Keller

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Size descriptions are off on the small side and they didn't offer much heat.
customer_reviews.author: anasynpunk

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for 14 hours then nothing
customer_reviews.text: I wore these socks 7 times for around 2 hours each time. I ride horses and my feet get really cold. Socks worked ok not great. Then the right sock did not heat up. Tried to return but no help. I talked to Amazon and the maker of these socks to no avail!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Caumiant

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: What a sexy sock, that is practical. The heat is so mellow and long lasting you wonder why its not working then you remember its only 20 degrees out, (with the windshield -10 degrees.) and I can feel every toe and their not frozen, their comfortable. You guys and your tech. What will you think of next ?
customer_reviews.author: honesty69

customer_reviews.title: Love these socks
customer_reviews.text: Love these socks. I like the 3 settings and that they heat from the bottom. They keep my toes warm for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Schifer

customer_reviews.title: Foot warmer life saver.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for if you have a job like mine where you’re outdoors all day in the winter time.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Warms your Toes, GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: So thrilled it actually warms my toes and bottom foot. Remote control is so fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra WB

customer_reviews.title: Not warm AT ALL!!!
customer_reviews.text: These socks are not warm at all. What a waste of money and time. Even sitting in front of the fireplace in the highest setting I can’t feel a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Nice socks but battery quit after one winter
customer_reviews.text: I liked the socks and they were long and comfortable. However, one of my batteries stopped after using them for only one winter
customer_reviews.author: missBailey

customer_reviews.title: Heated Socks
customer_reviews.text: The battery went down faster then expected. Also had to reset the battery to the remote evey time they were charged.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Arlt

customer_reviews.title: Socks failed
customer_reviews.text: The mobile warming battery heated socks failed after approximately 30 days of use. Very disappointed in these socks! Do not recommend these socks.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Muhs

customer_reviews.title: Battery life isn’t long - 5 hours at most
customer_reviews.text: Works well to keep your fight warm but only down side is battery seems to only last 5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: one sock has gone dead, after one weeks is ...
customer_reviews.text: one sock has gone dead,after one weeks is not working,the fully charged battery light goes off after 15 seconds,i can t returning these because they do not function as advertised
customer_reviews.author: marc delorme

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I finally broke down to wash these and now they don't work. So frustrusting....
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Not successful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely not what I expected or wanted... socks barley heat up to need and they only warm up your toes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a worthless product
customer_reviews.text: After reading numerous negative reviews about heated socks in general, I decided to give this one a try. I actually bought 4 brands from Amazon at the same time, all of them turned out to be worthless - i.e I felt almost zero heat on most of the brands, including this one.
customer_reviews.author: Aditya Garg

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: 2 complaints: 1) Didn't heat AT ALL--hence, total waste of $ 2) The wires on the bottom were so uncomfortable to stand on that even if they did heat, they would have been hard to ski with.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Pereira

customer_reviews.title: worthless
customer_reviews.text: Do not work at all. No significant heat and battery on one of the socks keeps turning itself off (even though fully charged).. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Carter

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Long battery life. Keeps the tootsies toasty. Great price and value.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C  Lockwood

product_meta.title: Mobile Warming Heated Socks with Lithium Battery - 2018 Model
feature_bullets: Hidden Wires, Three Selectable Heat Settings Wireless Controller
Adjusts Heat Levels Up to 11+ Hours of Heat Charge Time: 4.5hrs
Over-the-Calf Height Heat Zone, Under the Toes
